org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.closeable

Interface Closeable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommonReactor, PoolThreadReactorImpl, Reactor, ReactorImpl
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockingReactor, BlockingReactorMtImpl, Facility, IsolationReactor, IsolationReactorMtImpl, NonBlockingReactor, NonBlockingReactorMtImpl, PoolThreadReactorMtImpl, ReactorBase, ReactorMtImpl, SwingBoundReactor, SwingBoundReactorMtImpl, ThreadBoundReactor, ThreadBoundReactorMtImpl

    public interface Closeable
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    An object that depends on 1 or more reactors, so that when a reactor is closed the object is also closed. A closeable must carry a reference to its CloseableImpl and when closed should also close its CloseableImpl. A dependency on a reactor is created by calling addCloseable on that reactor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CloseableImpl asCloseableImpl()
      Returns the closealbe's closeableImpl reference.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close
